entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is mentioned as the one who jinxed the list. She is described as having a horrible trick and her idea is considered brilliant by Harry.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is mentioned as being fiercely upset about Hermione's trick and later gets furious with Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having a cold reaction to Cho's outburst and later descends the stairs to Snape's dungeon.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as being in his dungeon and Harry knows from experience how much easier it would be for him to cope with things there.

relationships.description: Harry and Cho are arguing about Hermione's trick. This is evident from their conversation where they both shout at each other.
Harry disagrees with Hermione's idea of jinxing the list and thinks it was a horrible trick.
